message: There could be a 3rd icon with each message, "star", "reply", "bookmark" or something similar. This would allow me to go back and reference interesting and useful messages at later dates much easier. Right now I have to dig through pages of the older topics on the group page to find the topic, then sort through the possibly hundreds of messages to find what I'm looking form.
@ericflo I'd imagine you've heard this from others also. Is it something the team is considering?
